get.description: Get info about the application. Upon success, the Cache-Control header will be set with the default maximum age.
Query the application for some information.
get.summary: Query the application for some information.

parameters.description: Include proofs of the transaction's inclusion in the block
parameters.name: prov

get.description: Get Block. If the height field is set to a non-default value, upon success, the Cache-Control header will be set with the default maximum age.
get.summary: Get block at a specified height

parameters.description: height to return. If no height is provided, it will fetch validator set which corresponds to the latest block.
parameters.name: height

get.description: The transaction won't be added to the mempool. Please refer to https://docs.tendermint.com/v0.34/tendermint-core/using-tendermint.html#formatting for formatting/encoding rules. Upon success, the Cache-Control header will be set with the default maximum age.
get.summary: Checks the transaction without executing it.

get.description: Get consensus parameters. If the height field is set to a non-default value, upon success, the Cache-Control header will be set with the default maximum age.

parameters.description: height to return. If no height is provided, it will fetch validator set which corresponds to the latest block.
parameters.name: height

get.description: Get consensus state. Not safe to call from inside the ABCI application during a block execution.
Get consensus state. Not safe to call from inside the ABCI application during a block execution.
Get node health. Returns empty result (200 OK) on success, no response - in case of an error.
Get Tendermint status including node info, pubkey, latest block hash, app hash, block height and time.

parameters.description: Include proofs of the transaction's inclusion in the block
parameters.name: prov

parameters.description: Maximum number of unconfirmed transactions to return (max 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get Validators. Validators are sorted by voting power. If the height field is set to a non-default value, upon success, the Cache-Control header will be set with the default maximum age.
get.summary: Get validator set at a specified height

parameters.description: height to return. If no height is provided, it will fetch validator set which corresponds to the latest block.
parameters.name: height
